page.title: 19West Witton Row Farm
page.content: There has been a farm on this site for over 250 years. The land is at present owned by Lord Lambton Mr.Henderson farms 296 acres _ the good land being worth approx.Â£1500 per acre (less for poorer grazing land). Mr.Henderson has farmed there for 15 years and has 220 acres grazing, 76 acres arable.The grazing land is for beef cattle, no milk being produced. There are 196 head of beef cattle which sell for Â£500_Â£600 each. There are also 600 sheep kept for wool,meat and breeding stock.A lamb sells for about Â£40 and Mr. Henderson visits Tow Law auction mart in May and October.Mr.Henderson loses (approx)1 calf and 14 lambs each year,mainly from pneumonia.
